name: Painting War
description:
Painting War was realised during a 48h Game Jam on "Street Art". It's a turn bases battle game for two players on local.

Two gangs clash in a city by tagging and fighting. In a limited time (10 turns) they have to tag a maximum of buildings.

Each player creates a team of four gangsters among three different characters. During his turn, the player has to do all action for his team. An action can be move, paint or fight.

Characters have specific characteristics:

  • HP : health point
  • Action : maximum actions during one turn
  • Power : attacking damage
  • Range : maximum distance to attack
  • Action Attack : attacking action cost

Buildings have different action costs :

  • Train : 1 action
  • Little building : 2 actions
  • Big Building : 3 actions
